column3: Traffic;Thailand: Six Cambodian workers are in a critical condition and at least eight more injured after an horrific car crash.------According to a report from the Thai police
column4: the incident happened at 4.20  on December 23
column8: Thailand.------The Nissan vehicle was carrying 14 Cambodian workers heading to Bangkok to work there
column9: but ran off the road and overturned.------An ambulance transported the six seriously injured people to Pokhao hospital. The identities and home provinces of the workers is unknown.------WARNING: Graphic images in source link:------http://www.arey-news.com/archives/281187
